message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but $175 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $125 for the product.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $155.
Alice, $155 is still a bit too high for me. I'm happy to pay $135 and I think that's a fair price for both of us. Let's close the deal.
I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $147.50.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $147.50 is still too high for my budget.  I'm firm at $135. If you're not willing to go that low, I'll have to go with John's offer.
I understand your position, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $145.
